Title: Berlin-Jerusalem
Actors: Lisa Kreuzer, Rivka Neuman, Markus Stockhausen
Plot: Two interconnected stories in the 1930s, one set in Berlin, the other in Palestine: Mania Vilbouchevich Shohat (1880-1961), called Tania, a Russian Jew and revolutionary, goes from Minsk to Palestine to live on a collective. She p...
